name: set tax invoice
script:
if not doc.taxes:
    if doc.company == "NCIG (M) Sdn Bhd":
        row = doc.append("taxes", {})
        row.charge_type = "On Net Total"
        row.account_head = "VAT Exempted - NCIG"
        row.rate = 0
        row.description = 'VAT Exempted'
    
    elif doc.company == "Nsty Holding Sdn Bhd":
        row = doc.append("taxes", {})
        row.charge_type = "On Net Total"
        row.account_head = "VAT Exempted - NHSB"
        row.rate = 0
        row.description = 'VAT Exempted'

doc.calculate_taxes_and_totals()
